Package org.eclipse.jface.viewers

Interface IFontProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSynchronizationLabelProvider, ColumnLabelProvider, DecoratingLabelProvider, PropertyColumnLabelProvider, SynchronizationLabelProvider, TableColumnViewerLabelProvider, TreeColumnViewerLabelProvider, WorkbenchLabelProvider
public interface IFontProvider
Interface to provide font representation for a given element.
Since:
3.0

      Font getFont(Object element)
      Provides a font for the given element.
